:: Wolfgang ::

:: Wolfgang reaches into his memory and remembers where the research bay is.
He walks towards it, ready to upgrade himself. ::
___________________________________________________________

:: Reptilica ::

:: Looks towards FZ. ::

What should I do now?
______________________________________________________________

:: Bloodystryke ::

:: Feeling bored, Bloodystryke flies a few miles away from the Iron Fist,
towards a small, peaceful forest.  He sits down on a log and reflects on his
life and how it has been changed by the great war.  He remembers when he and
his brother crash-landed on the planet. ::

Yes......
________________________________________________________________

:: Rainchark ::

:: Flies back towards the NDE base ::
